data.name: Carrera Cafe
data.author: @aesthie.fun
data.description: Cafe you can get custom latte art from with inspirational words, your face, images, etc.

info.parking: Metered street, some are permit only

tips: known for their famous lip wall
download \"coffee ripples\" app beforehand to create custom lattee art
la la land wall is unfortunately gone :(

data.name: Alfred Tea Room
data.author: @aesthie.fun
tips: Be quick about taking your pics because the shop next door might complain
Don't forget the floor tiles are really pretty
take pics in front of pink wall

data.name: The MILK Shop
data.author: @aesthie.fun
data.description: shot of sweets + milk logo outside
tips: Popular flavors tend to run out, come early

data.name: Sprinkles Ice Cream
data.author: @aesthie.fun
tips: Order signature captain crunch ice cream
prepare for long wait after work

data.name: Honey & Butter Macarons
data.author: @aesthie.fun
tips: boxes are only free if purchasing 10 macarons otherwie it's a $0
don't forget you can sample ice cream flavor

data.name: Amazebowls
data.author: @aesthie.fun
tips: Order the coconut bowl for the insta
